title: Whenever i try to log into my league of legends client the reconnect button will pop up. if i click
body:
hello fellow summoners,

recently i have had an issue and i need some help with it. Whenever i try to log into my league of legends client the reconnect button will pop up. if i click it my screen goes black and comes up with an error. i have tried everything. i have left it over a few nights and still fails to let me do anything. having the reconnect button there means i cannot play more games. I am really pissed of because i have spent alot of money buying rp and now i cant even use my account to play a single match 

PLEASE HELP MEEEE

replies.body:
>PLEASE HELP MEEEE

Screaming always gets you what you want.

What you could be in is a 'ghost game', which is the result of the server failing to recognise that the game ended or that your client has failed to connect to the servers. Have you tried rebooting your system?

Also, what OS are you on, and which ISP are you with?
